trans-unit.source: Represents a family of related fonts.
trans-unit.target: 代表一系列的相關字型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an anonymous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化匿名的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this default constructor when you want to create a composite font programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要以程式設計方式建立複合的字型，請使用此預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This means that you do not have to specify a font family name for the constructor, but you must populate the collections in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyMaps%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyNames%2A> collections prior to using the constructed instance.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您沒有指定字型家族名稱的建構函式，但您必須擴展中的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyMaps%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyNames%2A>之前使用建構的執行個體的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyNames%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.FamilyMaps%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> class from the specified font family name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>從指定的字型家族名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: Each family name that is specified in the `familyName` parameter can be preceded by a location reference to either a directory or a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 指定在每個系列名稱`familyName`前面參數可以是任一個目錄的位置參考或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The location reference is separated from the family name by a pound (`#`) character.
trans-unit.target: 位置參考以井字號分隔系列名稱 (`#`) 字元。

trans-unit.source: Multiple family names that are specified in the `familyName` parameter must be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 中所指定的多個系列名稱`familyName`參數必須以逗號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Each family can be a real font that directly represents a set of font files that share the same family name, or can be a reference to a family name that is defined in a composite font file.
trans-unit.target: 每個系列可以是實際的字型直接代表一組共用相同的系列名稱，字型檔案，或可以是複合字型檔案中定義的系列名稱的參考。

trans-unit.source: When multiple families are identified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families, handling code points that are not supported by the first font family.
trans-unit.target: 有多個家族識別時，第二個和後續的字型系列會做為後援系列，處理第一個字型系列不支援的字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: For every code point that is not supported by the first font family, each subsequent family is checked in turn.
trans-unit.target: 不支援第一個字型家族的每個字碼指標，會接著檢查每個後續的系列。

trans-unit.source: The family name or names that comprise the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含新的系列名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Multiple family names should be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 應該以逗號分隔多個系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: familyName cannot be .
trans-unit.target: familyName不能 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> class from the specified font family name and an optional base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>從指定的字型系列名稱和選擇性的基底類別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]值。

trans-unit.source: The `familyName` value can specify a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value, which requires a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to resolve the font reference.
trans-unit.target: `familyName`值可以指定相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值，這需要基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]字型參考解析。

trans-unit.source: The `baseUri` value can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: `baseUri`值可以是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is used to resolve `familyName`.
trans-unit.target: 指定的基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，用來解析`familyName`。

trans-unit.source: The family name or names that comprise the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含新的系列名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Multiple family names should be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 應該以逗號分隔多個系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the baseline and the character cell top.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基準和字元儲存格上方之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that indicates the distance between the baseline and the character cell top, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示基準和字元儲存格上方，之間的距離表示字型的 em 大小的比例。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that is used to resolve a font family name.
trans-unit.target: 取得基底[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，用來解析字型家族名稱。

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` if the font family name does not rely on a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for resolving the font reference.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是`null`如果字型家族名稱不會依賴基底[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]解決字型參考。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the font family name that is used to construct the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取用來建構字型家族名稱<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>物件，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>值

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current font family object and the specified font family object are the same.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的字型家族的物件和指定的字型系列物件是否相同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>来比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: if o is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 是否等於目前物件; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: If o is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If o is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects that are created by using a font family name, the FamilyMaps property returns an empty, read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>使用字型家族名稱所建立的物件，FamilyMaps 屬性會傳回空白、 唯讀集合。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap> object defines which font to use for displaying a specified set of Unicode characters of a specified culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap>物件會定義用來顯示一組指定的 Unicode 字元指定的文化特性的哪一種字型。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMapCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMapCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> values that represent the font family names of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串的集合和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>值，表示字型家族名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary"></xref> that represents the font family names.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary"> </xref>表示字型家族名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of typefaces for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的字樣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *OneOrMoreFontFamilyTypefaces* One or more of typefaces for the object.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*OneOrMoreFontFamilyTypefaces*一或多個字樣物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref> that represents a collection of typefaces for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"> </xref> ，表示集合的字樣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 做為雜湊函式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 很適合用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，表示目前物件的雜湊碼。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects that represent the type faces in the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>代表字體預設系統字型位置中的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line spacing value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定列間距值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing is the recommended baseline-to-baseline distance for the text in this font relative to the em size.
trans-unit.target: 行距是建議的基準-基準距離中這種字型的 em 大小與文字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the line spacing for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示行距<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font family name that is used to construct the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建構字型家族名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: To return the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.BaseUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回基底[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>物件，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.BaseUri%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.BaseUri%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>值

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> object was created without specifying a font family name, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>已建立物件，而不指定字型家族名稱、 傳回值為<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The font family name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 字型家族名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> object was created without specifying a font family name, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>已建立物件，而不指定字型家族名稱、 傳回值為<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The source location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object, including the directory or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] location reference.
trans-unit.target: 來源位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>物件，包括目錄或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]位置參考。
